channel.title: WARNING! Imminent explosion expected in the vicinity of Ordinary Village.
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "WARNING! Imminent explosion expected in the vicinity of Ordinary Village."

item.title: Re: WARNING! Imminent explosion expected in the vicinity of Ordinary Village.
item.content:encoded: Naito was just playing up the drama haha, if you are in a village when the leader completes the IM then everyone in the village gets Survived the Impossible.

item.title: Re: WARNING! Imminent explosion expected in the vicinity of Ordinary Village.
item.content:encoded: Well you might want to head on over. We have 44 as of this minute.

item.title: Re: WARNING! Imminent explosion expected in the vicinity of Ordinary Village.
item.content:encoded:
Mmm just wondering what do you mean if we can survive? is there a chance to it?
and yah ill join ur village if it gets 40+ members

item.title: WARNING! Imminent explosion expected in the vicinity of Ordinary Village.
item.content:encoded: I will be destroying Ordinary Village, HA HA HA. All I need is 50 ninja to kill. Come now and get Solid Fire hurled at you with a parting gift of Survived the Impossible, well if you can survive.
